name: userstyles.org / Stylish Dark Theme
description:
A theme to make the Stylish website look nice and dark!

If you would like to check out my channel, it can be found here: https://www.youtube.com/daniel55555d
additional_info: VERSION 1.0 - 8 December 2021 - Released theme (Known bugs, I do not know how to change the colour of the sidebar icons, android theme creator not fully supported)
